name: Imam Bayıldı
description: Imam bayıldı is a delicious Turkish dish made with eggplants stuffed with onions, tomatoes, and garlic.

name: Manti
description: Manti is Turkish dumplings filled with spiced meat, usually served with yogurt and garlic sauce.

name: Baklava
description: Baklava is a traditional Turkish dessert made with thin layers of dough and filled with pistachios or walnuts.

name: Stuffed Vegetables (Dolma)
description: Dolma is a dish made by stuffing vegetables such as peppers, eggplants, or leaves.

name: Pilaf
description: Pilaf is a staple in Turkish cuisine, usually served with meat or vegetables.

name: Kunefe
description: Künefe is a Turkish dessert made with shredded pastry dough and cheese, soaked in syrup.

name: Lahmacun
description: Lahmacun is a Turkish pizza made with thin dough topped with minced meat, onions, tomatoes, and spices.

name: Meatballs (Köfte)
description: Köfte are Turkish meatballs flavored with various spices and herbs.

name: Pastry (Borek)
description: Börek is a traditional Turkish pastry made with thin layers of dough filled with cheese, minced meat, or spinach.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves (Sarma)
description: Sarma is a dish made with grape or cabbage leaves stuffed with a mixture of rice, meat, and spices.

name: Turkish Pancake (Gözleme)
description: Gözleme is a traditional Turkish flatbread filled with various ingredients such as cheese, potatoes, or spinach.

name: Salad
description: Salad is a light dish made with fresh vegetables, dressed with olive oil, lemon juice, or vinegar.

name: Bulgur Salad (Kısır)
description: Kısır is a Turkish salad made with fine bulgur, tomatoes, cucumbers, herbs, and pomegranate molasses.

name: Pide
description: Pide is a Turkish flatbread topped with various ingredients and baked in a stone oven.

name: Chicken (Tavuk)
description: Tavuk is a protein-rich dish made with chicken, flavored with various spices and vegetables.

name: Halva
description: Halva is a traditional Turkish dessert made with semolina or flour, sweetened with sugar, and flavored with butter.
